fulltext:
TRẦN ĐỨC MẠNH
CAREER OBJECTIVES 
Leverage the power of technology to build scalable, robust, secure and widely 
adopted products. 
EXPERIENCE 
Li&Fung, Ho Chi Minh — Senior Developer 
JAN 2020 - PRESENT 
●
Li&Fung Limited is a Bermuda-incorporated, Hong Kong-based supply chain 
manager primarily for US and EU brands https://www.lifung.com 
●
Integrate with client systems for Digital Supply Chain project. 
●
Stacks: NodeJS/Typescript/ElasticSearch/DynamoDB/Lambda/AWS Services… 
Kompa, Ho Chi Minh — Tech Lead 
JUN 2019 - DEC 2019 
●
Kompa is a social network company, including social listening and social 
marketing https://kompa.ai, https://consulting.kompa.ai 
●
Build and lead a team with 6 members: 1 backend, 1 frontend, 1 mobile, 1 
tester, 1 designer and 1 BA. 
●
Integrate API from Stock Exchange and SSI Core. 
●
Build stock price board for SSI Securities Corporation - is one of the 
pioneer companies at Vietnam stock market https://iboard.ssi.com.vn 
●
Build trading function on stock price board. Currently, it’s on UAT 
http://iboard.kompa.vn 
●
Stacks: NodeJS/Typescript/ReactJS/React Native, RESTful/GraphQL, 
ActiveMQ, Nginx, MongoDB/Redis... 
VRED, Ho Chi Minh — Tech Lead 
AUG 2018 - MAY 2019 
●
VRED is a Vietnam e-commerce platform www.vred.vn, www.vaylaithap.vn 
●
Build and lead a team with 7 members: 2 full-stack, 1 backend, 1 
frontend, 1 mobile, 1 tester and 1 devops. 
●
Apply Scrum/Agile project development to ensure deliver products on time 
●
Responsible for making technical decisions and research the latest 
technology trends 
●
Integrate with various third-party providers such as Giao Hang Tiet Kiem, 
ZaloPay, Momo,... 
●
Build satellite pages such as Support, Blog, News based on Wordpress for 
fast deployment and suitable for such CMS-like pages. 
●
Stacks: NodeJS/ReactJS/React Native, RESTful, RabbitMQ, AWS, Nginx, 
PostgreSQL/MongoDB/Redis… 
ShareRing, Ho Chi Minh — Tech Lead 
NOVEMBER 2017 - AUGUST 2018 
●
ShareRing is an Australian company with a focus on Blockchain technology 
●
Lead Backend team to build platforms from scratch which connect and 
interact with Blockchain 
●
Contribute to building a team from the beginning 
●
Stacks: Python, NodeJS, ReactJS, GraphQL, RESTful, ActiveMQ, AWS, Nginx, 
MongoDB, Redis, Blockchain(Ethereum/Tendermint) 
Flix Viet Jsc, Ho Chi Minh — Fullstack developer 
OCTOBER 2016 - OCTOBER 2017 
●
Rebuild and optimize a smartTV app on Tizen(SamSung TV) and WebOS(LG TV). 
Reduce startup time from 15 seconds to 2 seconds on weak-computing and 
low-resource devices following NetFlix technical tips and tricks. 
●
Contribute to building RESTful API server using Django framework which 
can handle 100K requests/seconds at peak time. 
●
Stacks: Python, NodeJS, AngularJS, AWS.  
MASE Hub, Hanoi — Tech Lead 
OCTOBER 2014 - OCTOBER 2016 
●
Lead a development team in an outsourcing company.  
●
Stacks: Python, NodeJS, Javascript.  
Tinh Van Group, Hanoi — Fullstack developer 
FEBRUARY 2012 - SEPTEMBER 2014 
●
Project: Classbook System 
●
Stacks: Python, Android, Javascript, Cordova.  
Ex-Artisan Company, Hanoi — Mobile developer 
SEPTEMBER 2010 - JANUARY 2012 
●
A Japanese outsourcing company in mobile development. 
●
Stacks: Android, iOS.  
EDUCATION 
Thang Long University, Hanoi — Bachelor  
2005 - 2010 
Major in Information System 
CERTIFICATES 
Pragmatic Scrum certificate - https://hocvienagile.com

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin

experiences.detail:
● Li&Fung Limited is a Bermuda-incorporated, Hong Kong-based supply chain manager primarily for US and EU brands https://www.lifung.com
● Integrate with client systems for Digital Supply Chain project.
● Stacks: NodeJS/Typescript/ElasticSearch/DynamoDB/Lambda/AWS Services...

● Kompa is a social network company, including social listening and social marketing https://kompa.ai, https://consulting.kompa.ai
● Build and lead a team with 6 members: 1 backend, 1 frontend, 1 mobile, 1 tester, 1 designer and 1 BA. ● Integrate API from Stock Exchange and SSI Core. ● Build stock price board for SSI Securities Corporation - is one of the pioneer companies at Vietnam stock market https://iboard.ssi.com.vn
● Build trading function on stock price board. Currently, it’s on UAT http://iboard.kompa.vn
● Stacks: NodeJS/Typescript/ReactJS/React Native, RESTful/GraphQL, ActiveMQ, Nginx, MongoDB/Redis...

● VRED is a Vietnam e-commerce platform www.vred.vn, www.vaylaithap.vn
● Build and lead a team with 7 members: 2 full-stack, 1 backend, 1 frontend, 1 mobile, 1 tester and 1 devops.
● Apply Scrum/Agile project development to ensure deliver products on time
● Responsible for making technical decisions and research the latest technology trends
● Integrate with various third-party providers such as Giao Hang Tiet Kiem, ZaloPay, Momo,... ● Build satellite pages such as Support, Blog, News based on Wordpress for fast deployment and suitable for such CMS-like pages.
● Stacks: NodeJS/ReactJS/React Native, RESTful, RabbitMQ, AWS, Nginx, PostgreSQL/MongoDB/Redis...

● ShareRing is an Australian company with a focus on Blockchain technology
● Lead Backend team to build platforms from scratch which connect and interact with Blockchain ● Contribute to building a team from the beginning
● Stacks: Python, NodeJS, ReactJS, GraphQL, RESTful, ActiveMQ, AWS, Nginx, MongoDB, Redis, Blockchain(Ethereum/Tendermint)

● Rebuild and optimize a smartTV app on Tizen(SamSung TV) and WebOS(LG TV). Reduce startup time from 15 seconds to 2 seconds on weak-computing and low-resource devices following NetFlix technical tips and tricks.
● Contribute to building RESTful API server using Django framework which can handle 100K requests/seconds at peak time.
● Stacks: Python, NodeJS, AngularJS, AWS.

● Lead a development team in an outsourcing company.
● Stacks: Python, NodeJS, Javascript.
● Project: Classbook System ● Stacks: Python, Android, Javascript, Cordova.

A Japanese outsourcing company in mobile development.
